name: WaterFall (Zore)
description:
In this game you have to take on the role of a fish hunter. You dive into the water with a harpoon to catch as many fish as possible until your oxygen runs out, then sell them on the boat.

Control

WASD/←↑→↓ - movement

Control/Space - ascent and descent in the water

E - Interaction

LMB - Shot from a harpoon

RMB - Aim with a harpoon

Authors:

I am the main programmer
